[[Naruto Uzumaki]] — while in [[Nine-Tails Chakra Mode]] — creates a [[Big Ball Rasengan]] in one of his hands, which is then surrounded by three regular-sized [[Rasengan]], in a similar manner to [[Wikipedia:Natural satellite|moons]] around a planet. When coming into contact with a target, the disordered rotations of the individual Rasengan, created by the central and smaller ones spinning in different directions, interact with each other to form a massive and turbulent wave-like vortex.

The strength of this technique is so great that it even took a shinobi reincarnated by the [[Impure World Reincarnation]] technique a significant amount of time to regenerate, which they normally do instantly.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 558, page 1</ref>
